amendment.description: To increase funding for activities to prevent the mother-to-child transmission of HIV.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1623 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1623 proposed by Senator DeWine to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR 9/11/2003 S11321-11324, S11330-11331; text: CR 9/11/2003 S11321) To increase funding for activities to prevent the mother-to-child transmission of HIV.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1623 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1623 proposed by Senator DeWine to Amendment SA 1542.
